title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. The student can also earn the second point if an incorrect number of coulombs from the first equation is used correctly in the second equation.
descriptions: The response does not include a calculation equivalent to either of the following and the corresponding answer.
The response includes a calculation equivalent to only the first of the following and the corresponding answer.
The response includes calculations equivalent to both of the following and the corresponding answers.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not indicate both of the following.

  • The claim is incorrect.

  • Cell potential depends only on the cell reaction and the relative concentrations of the reactants.
